title: How do I use the activity reminder function of my Talkband B1?
answer: Setthe following in your Huawei TalkBand app: **Interval**,**Start**, **End**, and **Repeat**. Afteryou set an activity reminder, your B1 will monitor your excise load during theset period. If you do not excise enough, your B1 will vibrate to remind you oftaking care of yourself.
